name: Hike In High Park

location.name: High Park - Northeast corner entrance at Bloor St W and Parkside Dr

description:
Get ready to lace up your hiking shoes and join us for an unforgettable adventure! The perfect way to escape the city chaos, soak up some nature, and meet awesome new people. Think of it as a social session with a side of fresh air. 

Dive into the hidden trails. These secret paths are packed with wildlife and the park’s rare oak savannah ecology. We'll be trekking down into a nature treasure hunt while taking photos at key landmarks.Wander past trail gems like sculptures, the historic Colborne Lodge, and the Grenadier Pond. Wrap up at The Grenadier Cafe for an optional coffee or light lunch. Stay, sip, and chat with your new trail buddies, or head out if you’ve got places to be. Bring a water bottle to hydrate and see you on the path!

name: Community Environment Day at Central Technical School
description:
Join Councillor Saxe (Ward 11) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged or loose compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted). Please bring a container to pick up loose compost.

name: Honey
description: Our Chi has never been sweeter. Featuring pole dancers, DJ performances, Asian food vendors, photobooth, and sweet and sticky drink specials.
